MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA9 postcode area of St Helens affecting properties in Bourne Gardens and surrounding area.  In order to complete repairs following a fault that started on the evening of Sunday 28th February our engineers on site need to isolate the power at 10:00am and we expect the power to be restored by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:35am on 2nd March 2021.
